title: Steraks can stack with triforce?
body:
So {{item:3053}} passive can stack and cause {{item:3078}} to have an insane on hit effect.
Shouldn't {{item:3053}} increasing base AD be unique?
Because then with {{item:3078}} it just get an insane on hit effect.

replies.body: i figured this out ages ago, i use it on yorick, but getting more than one is wasteful
the % increase stacks giving like 240% base ad at 4 steraks, and triforce stacks up 200% of that, leaving the player with around 900 damage sheen effect
wow, but, even with this, i dont think its worth it
not new it well stack with lich and iceborn as well if im not mistaken
